errors.error_description: Incorrect requirements file name used for pip installation
Using 'makemigrations' instead of 'migrate' for database initialization
correction_candidates: Change 'python manage.py makemigrations' to 'python manage.py migrate'
Add 'python manage.py migrate' after 'python manage.py makemigrations'
Replace 'python manage.py makemigrations' with 'python manage.py syncdb'
Change 'python manage.py makemigrations' to 'python manage.py migrate --run-syncdb'
errors.golden_answer: Change 'python manage.py makemigrations' to 'python manage.py migrate'
